name: Ott
description: '''Ott''' (born 1968), real name Otteran Langrell, is a British record producer and musician who has worked with [[Sin√©ad O'Connor]], [[Embrace (English band)|Embrace]], [[the Orb]], and [[Brian Eno]], and has achieved recognition since 2002 for his own psychedelic dub tracks and his collaborations with [[Simon Posford]] ([[Hallucinogen (musician)|Hallucinogen]] / [[Shpongle]]). He has released two albums on [[Twisted Records (UK)|Twisted Records]]: ''[[Blumenkraft]]'' (2003), ''[[Skylon (album)|Skylon]]'' (2008), and four albums on Ottsonic: ''[[Mir (album)|Mir]]'' (2011), ''[[Fairchildren (album)|Fairchildren]]'' (2015), ''Heads'' (2022) and ''Hiraeth'' (2024).
